sentences.english: Gog saw the gun and his face went white.
sentences.chinese: 高格看见了那支枪，脸色煞白。

sentences.english: He said he is less thrilled that Mr. Killinger remains in command.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，对基林格继续执掌大权的并不感到激动。

sentences.english: Glion has been the very origin of my journey.
sentences.chinese: 格里昂是我工作历程的开端。

sentences.english: Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
sentences.chinese: 使用这个属性来控制储存格内容和框线之间的距离。

sentences.english: However, Metzger didn't respond when I asked him for copies of the relevant messages.
sentences.chinese: 然而，梅茨格没有回应当我问他的副本有关信息。

sentences.english: This will give the opportunity for Chase Budinger to play more and get more experience.
sentences.chinese: 我的缺阵将让巴丁格获得更多的上场时间和比赛经验。

sentences.english: A family in Grain Valley, Missouri, is trying to adopt him, "We can love him."
sentences.chinese: 密苏里州格莱因河谷的一户人家尝试收养他。

sentences.english: Running at 24 frames per second, that's the pace of Mark Lee.
sentences.chinese: 他永远往前跑，一秒二十四格，是李屏宾的步履节奏。

sentences.english: Jamie Carragher has talked about a "massive week" approaching for the Reds.
sentences.chinese: 克拉格谈到过对红军来说“至关重要的一周。”

sentences.english: The algebraic essence of residual lattices for various logical algebras was pointed out.
sentences.chinese: 进一步指出了各种逻辑代数的剩余格的代数本质。

sentences.english: Creation is then rooted in the mutual love of the persons of the Triune God.
sentences.chinese: 接着，受造之物被扎根在三一神位格互相内住的爱里。

sentences.english: But Gog doesn’t want to hear about our planet.
sentences.chinese: 可是高格不想听我们这颗星球的事。

sentences.english: writing to you because I'm not giving up on Gloria.
sentences.chinese: 我写信给你是因为我不想放弃格洛里亚。

sentences.english: Tom saw that it was his old master, Mr.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆看到那是他的老主人格兰姆斯先生。

sentences.english: University of East Anglia, Norwich NR47TJ, UK.
sentences.chinese: 10东安格利亚大学，英国诺里奇NR47TJ。
